actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for an increase in the number of mental health professionals serving in health professional shortage areas.
short_title: Rural Mental Health Services Amendments of 1993

summary.text: Rural Mental Health Services Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services, in providing contracts for scholarships and loan repayments, to ensure that the number of mental health professionals assigned for health professional shortage areas is appropriate.

titles.title: Rural Mental Health Services Amendments of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for an increase in the number of mental health professionals serving in health professional shortage areas.
